events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, demonstrating strong experience with backend development.
Application has been reviewed and categorised under Engineering roles based on keywords such as software engineer and developer mentioned in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s recruitment process.
The initial screening call went well; the candidate demonstrated good grasp of devops concepts and software engineering principles.
Candidate responded promptly and positively to the follow-up questions regarding their experience with cloud infrastructure.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the senior developer team on May 7th to assess coding and system design skills.
